sqls.sql: SELECT unode_next, mo_no, wkn, wkn_next, wkn_layer, wkp_no, wkn_desc, wkn_part_no, wkn_part_name, wkn_part_spec, wkn_unit_price, wkn_is_key, wkn_pageno, wkn_is_line, wkn_need_qc, wkn_efficiency, wkn_batch_rule, wkn_batch_qty_min, wkn_batch_qty_add, wkn_batch_qty_max, wkn_batch_qty, wkn_output_rate, wkn_output_rate_pretotal, wkn_ability_need_n, wkn_ability_need_d, wkn_ability_incre_n, wkn_ability_max_n, wkn_difficulty_rate, wkn_wkc_rule, wkc_num_min, wkc_num_max, wkn_cannot_break, wkn_ok_rate_c, wkn_ok_rate_total_c, wkn_ok_rate_b, wkn_ok_rate_total_b, wkn_ok_rate_a, wkn_ok_rate_total_a, wkn_wkt_transfer_in_c, wkn_wkt_transfer_in_b, wkn_wkt_transfer_in_a, wkn_wkt_transfer_out_c, wkn_wkt_transfer_out_b, wkn_wkt_transfer_out_a, wkn_fixed_add_qty_c, wkn_fixed_add_qty_b, wkn_fixed_add_qty_a, wkn_extra_add_qty, wkn_interval_time_type, wkn_interval_time, net_weight, net_weight_min, net_weight_max, wkn_spec1_txt, wkn_spec2_txt, wkn_spec3_txt, wkn_spec4_txt, wkn_spec1_num, wkn_spec2_num, wkn_spec3_num, wkn_spec4_num, wkn_cannot_earlier, wkn_cannot_earlier_than, wkn_req_qty, mo_rmb_rmk01, mo_rmb_rmk02, mo_rmb_rmk03, mo_rmb_rmk04, mo_rmb_rmk05, mo_rmb_rmk06, mo_rmb_rmk07, mo_rmb_rmk08, mo_rmb_rmk09, mo_rmb_rmk10, mo_rmb_rmk11, mo_rmb_rmk12, mo_rmb_rmk13, mo_rmb_rmk14, mo_rmb_rmk15, mo_rmb_rmk16, mo_rmb_rmk17, mo_rmb_rmk18, mo_rmb_rmk19, mo_rmb_rmk20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host, wkn_need_fpi, wkn_need_fbi, wkn_unit2, wkn_unit_rate, wkn_need_aps FROM mo_rmb WHERE unode = @unode;
